title: Alabama Public Records Request – May 12, 2022 Arrest of Adnen Hannachi (Use of Taser Following Crash)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

copies of all available video and audio records related to the arrest of Adnen Hannachi on or around May 12, 2022, following a multi-car crash on University Boulevard near Cottage Hill Road.

Please include:

All body-worn camera footage from Mobile police officers involved in the arrest and incident

Any dashcam or in-car footage from responding police units

Any bystander or third-party video obtained by officers (if retained)

All dispatch audio, 911 calls, or radio traffic related to the crash response and subsequent arrest

Footage of the Taser deployments and suspect’s resistance during attempted transport to ambulance

Incident Details:

Date & Time: May 12, 2022 (afternoon)

Location: University Boulevard at Cottage Hill Road, Mobile, AL

Arrestee: Adnen Hannachi (27 years old)

Charges:

Three counts of second-degree assault

One count of obstructing justice using a false identity

Summary:

Following a multi-car crash involving four hospitalizations, suspect became combative when EMS attempted to load him into an ambulance

He swung at officers and was tased twice after shouting “I don’t die”

At least one officer, a female, was struck

The incident was partially recorded by a bystander (Kevin Thomas)

Please notify me of any fees in advance. If any portion of the materials is withheld, please provide the non-exempt portions and cite the specific statutory exemptions relied upon.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News

title: Georgia Open Records Act Request – March 12, 2025 Traffic Stop and Officer Dragging Incident (Bryan Myers)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Georgia Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

copies of all video and audio records related to the March 12, 2025 traffic stop involving Bryan Myers that resulted in a Villa Rica officer being dragged by a vehicle.

Please include:

All dashcam footage, including the full clip showing the officer clinging to the SUV

All body-worn camera footage from Officer V. Hamilton and any backup officers

Any 911 calls, dispatch audio, and radio communications related to the stop, pursuit, or arrest

Footage of the foot pursuit and arrest, including the recovery of a firearm and ecstasy pills

Booking footage or arrest scene video, if available

Incident Details:

Date & Time: March 12, 2025, approximately 2:30 AM

Location: Villa Rica, GA

Officer Involved: Officer V. Hamilton

Suspect: Bryan Myers (49, of Temple, GA)

Summary:

Vehicle stopped for equipment violation

Suspect re-entered SUV, physically resisted, and fled at ~60 MPH with officer partially inside

Officer Hamilton ultimately regained control and stopped the vehicle

Myers fled on foot into nearby woods, dropped a firearm, and was later arrested

Ecstasy pills were recovered from his possession

Charges Filed: Assault on a peace officer, DUI, illegal firearm possession, drug possession, and other related offenses

Please notify me in advance of any associated costs. If any portion of the requested records is withheld, please release all non-exempt material and cite the specific statutory exemption used.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Police Cam News
